General.Name: Thai Sugar Terminal Public Company Limited
General.Description: TSTE Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, primarily engages in the production and distribution of wheat flour in Thailand. The company is also involved in the provision transfer and transportation services for sugar and various agricultural products; recruitment and management laborer services; and land rental and trading, land lots appropriation, and office and commercial units rental activities, as well as the construction of buildings on land for sale. In addition, it engages in the warehousing and loading of goods; silo and warehouse rental activities; property rental and trading activities; extraction of palm oil; transfer of goods for cargo ship; recruitment and management laborer service; manufacture and distribute seaweed, seasoned seaweed, snacks, and ready meals; and production of packing, plastic bag, plastic bottle, as well as operation of a port. The company was formerly known as Thai Sugar Terminal Public Company Limited and changed its name to TSTE Public Company Limited in May 2023. TSTE Public Company Limited was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Samut Prakan, Thailand.
General.Address: 90 Moo 1, Poochaosamingphrai Road, Samut Prakan, Thailand, 10130
